overview: When Mert gets the news of his father's death, he quickly sets out to go to Adana. Afraid to get on the plane, he decides to go this way in his car. As he stops for shopping at a gas station on the road, he notices that his car has been stolen. In the meantime, the same gas station Yigit. On the way, Yigit took the list that his father had bequeathed to him seven months ago. Yiğit will stop by certain places along the way, complete the list and make videos for the Youtube channel. However, there is an important requirement on the list. Yiğit's father Rıza never said to go alone.
title: We Are In Trouble
